name: Party Slapped COVID-19 Edition
description:
Tired of all those illegal pandemic parties? Wish you could slap some sense in the people involved? Well now you can in Party Slapped COVID-19 Edition! Tour wild underground parties, traverse the mad labyrinths and tunnels they hide in and slap all the sense you can to stop this pandemic!

This is a Buildbox game, you will need the app to run it.

https://www.buildbox.com/
